body.name: TURNSOLE Waffle Cushion for Pressure Sores - Bed Sore Cushions for Butt for Elderly - Pressure Sore Cushions for Sitting in Recliner - Inflatable Seat Cushion for Pressure Relief
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 5 mins
features: ★Selected fabric★: High-quality PVC fabric, comfortable and breathable, durable. Breathable and comfortable in summer, it is not easy to sweat, and it is not easy to harden in winter.
★Porous design★: Adopt high-temperature thermal compression and multiple vent design to disperse the seat body pressure and accelerate air dredging.
★Good air-tightness★: The transparent PVC air-filling hole and the air-filling bag adopt heat-sealing technology. After many pressure tests, the air-tightness is strong

★Easy to inflate★:Equipped with special pump,Easy to use.Fine seaming does not skip stitches, and the feet are fine and not easy to leak. It is recommended to inflate 80%, the surface creases will disappear, and lightly pressing with hands will have obvious resilience.
★Usage Scenario★:Wheelchair ; Office chair ; Car ; Travel ; Stadium.
body.description: Instructions:1 Inflatable can be used inflatable tube inflatable lake to integrate other inflatable methods2 Connect the inflation tube to the air nozzle, and open the safety cushion inside to inflate and deflate.Precautions:1 When inflating with an inflatable tube, pay attention to pressure control to prevent the air cushion from bursting.2 Clean the air cushion directly with neutral detergent to clean the surface and dry it.3 Prevent sharp objects from puncturing the airbag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works perfect for my needs. You can inflate it or deflate it to your comfort. It comes with a pump too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped my butt out
reviews.reviewText: Took care ofy pain hasn't disappointed yetVery comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a pressure sore on my bottom and it is difficult to treat! This does what it's designed to do - evenly distributes the weight of my body. I can sit at my desk all day now and not hurt. Concept!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Can not recommend purchasing this item!
reviews.reviewText: This waffle does not work properly. There are several things about it that did not meet my expectations.1) product does not blow up properly/hold air well. The pump is worthless, I had to blow it up by my mouth. The air did not hold from blowing it up, so I could barely get it aired up.2) product is not comfortable. The waffle is too flat, the air valve step won’t close in, so it pokes up, and because it doesn’t fill up well, it is almost completely flattened when I sit and does not relieve pressure -which is what it is meant to do.3) the instructions are 100% in a foreign language…no English. I tried to fill this, using common sense. I can’t imagine that I filled it wrong, but there’s no way to know because I couldn’t read the instructions. Very disappointed by this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Infatible waffle pressure relief cushion
reviews.reviewText: The product arrived faster than expected. The item suffered from one of the admonished failure mentioned in the brochure. Having only had the product for a day, it begin to leak around the inlet valve area to the main body. The leak appears to be a poor sealing process to that surface. I actually enjoyed the relief that the product provided but the leak is not acceptable and seems to be anticipated, as noted from the brochure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do not over inflate this item.
reviews.reviewText: I use it to combat "pressure sores" It serves me well for that purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used a similar product like this in the hospital when I had to sit in the chair, so I wanted to buy something similar. You have to blow it up with your mouth by pinching open the valve you are blowing in. They do not send you the part for the pump to blow it up. But, it's very easy to blow up quickly. You can adjust how much air you want in the cushion. For a wheelchair, I didn't blow it up all the way and it was very comfortable. I would recommend that if you're short, to make sure that the pillow is set all the way back. It's a strange concept and doesn't seem like it would be comfortable, but it is for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Junk! Pump easily breaks!
reviews.reviewText: This is useless! Unfortunately, I purchase this two times for my elderly mother! The pump for the first one broke quickly. It took forever to inflate and w leaked air needing to be reinflated at least daily.The new one arrive today! Again, the pump broke this time before I could even get it inflated. I blew it up with my mouth. But there is already leaking out.This should just go in the trash, but I’m going to return it. There will not be a third purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: It's perfect and easy to regulate.
reviews.reviewText: Husband has pressure sores that are in the process of healing and are still uncomfortable. This was purchased for the car as he could only sit on the seat for about 10 minutes before being in pain. It was easy to inflate and you can regulate how soft or hard the cushion is. We can now go on longer car journeys, best purchase I've made highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to inflate, very versatile and can be used anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 24, 2023
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Performs as expected but does seem a little insubstantial
reviews.reviewText: The cushion does alter the seating position for patients who are sitting long term and it's been successful in relieving the pressure of being in a chair or bed for long periods. It is inflatable and it's important to play around a little with pressure to ensure that you find a comfortable middle ground between too soft and not supportive and too hard which can indent into the skin. It's not at all "premium" in feel - it's the quality of a swimming armband - but overall I'm happy with it and its performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 16, 2023
